SA10bsa027_u:5: deśayāmāsa saṃbuddhastaṃ vande vadatāṃ varam // Mś_1.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:6: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:7: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kkacana kecana // Mś_1.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:9: tathaivādhipateyaṃ ca pratyayo nāsti pañcamaḥ // Mś_1.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:10: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:11: avidyamāne svabhāve parabhāvo na vidyate // Mś_1.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:17: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim // Mś_1.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:18: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10bsa027_u:19: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate // Mś_1.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:21: athānālambane dharme kuta ālambanaṃ punaḥ // Mś_1.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:23: nānantaramato yuktaṃ niruddhe pratyayaśca kaḥ // Mś_1.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:24: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:27: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat // Mś_1.13 //
SA10bsa027_u:36: gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate /
SA10bsa027_u:38: ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:39: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ // Mś_2.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:43: ṛte gatergamyamānaṃ gamyamānaṃ hi gamyate // Mś_2.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:45: yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ // Mś_2.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:47: gantāraṃ hi tiraskṛtya gamanaṃ nopapadyate // Mś_2.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:49: gamane 'sati gantātha kuta eva bhaviṣyati // Mś_2.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:50: gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:51: anyo ganturagantuśca kastṛtīyo hi gacchati // Mś_2.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:53: gamanena vinā gantā yadā naivopapadyate // Mś_2.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:54: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
SA10bsa027_u:56: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:57: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati // Mś_2.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:60: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
SA10bsa027_u:62: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamānaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
SA10bsa027_u:64: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
SA10bsa027_u:67: gamanena vinā gantā yadā naivopapadyate // Mś_2.16 //
SA10bsa027_u:69: gamanaṃ saṃpravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca gateḥ samā // Mś_2.17 //
SA10bsa027_u:70: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:71: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate // Mś_2.18 //
SA10bsa027_u:72: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi /
SA10bsa027_u:73: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca // Mś_2.19 //
SA10bsa027_u:77: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // Mś_2.21 //
SA10bsa027_u:78: gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:80: gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:81: gatī dve nopapadyete yasmādeke pragacchati // Mś_2.23 //
SA10bsa027_u:82: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:83: nāsadbhūto 'pi gamanaṃ triprakāraṃ sa gacchati // Mś_2.24 //
SA10bsa027_u:85: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate // Mś_2.25 //
SA10bsa027_u:88: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:90: svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati /
SA10bsa027_u:91: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān // Mś_3.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:99: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ // Mś_3.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:103: nāstīti upādānādīni bhaviṣyanti punaḥ katham // Mś_3.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:104: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:109: rūpeṇāpi na nirmuktaṃ dṛśyate rūpakāraṇam // Mś_4.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:111: āhetukaṃ, na cāstyarthaḥ kaścidāhetukaḥ kvacit // Mś_4.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:113: akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt nāstyakāryaṃ ca kāraṇam // Mś_4.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:117: tasmāt rūpagatān kāṃścinna vikalpān vikalpayet // Mś_4.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:121: sarveṣāmeva bhāvānāṃ rūpeṇaiva samaḥ kramaḥ // Mś_4.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:122: vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10bsa027_u:123: sarvaṃ tasyāparihṛtaṃ samaṃ sādhyena jāyate // Mś_4.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:124: vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10bsa027_u:125: sarvaṃ tasyānupālabdhaṃ samaṃ sādhyena jāyate // Mś_4.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:129: alakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta syātpūrvaṃ yadi lakṣaṇāt // Mś_5.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:130: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kkacit /
SA10bsa027_u:131: asatyalakṣaṇe bhāve kramatāṃ kuha lakṣaṇam // Mś_5.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:136: tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:140: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
SA10bsa027_u:141: ākāśam ākāśasamā dhātavaḥ pañca ye pare // Mś_5.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:142: astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:143: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam // Mś_5.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:147: taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati // Mś_6.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:148: rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:149: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // Mś_6.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:151: bhavetāṃ rāgaraktau hi nirapekṣau parasparam // Mś_6.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:152: naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha /
SA10bsa027_u:153: pṛthaktve sahabhāvo 'tha kuta eva bhaviṣyati // Mś_6.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:159: sahabhāvaṃ kimarthaṃ tu parikalpayase tayoḥ // Mś_6.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:164: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
SA10bsa027_u:173: asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ // Mś_7.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:177: maulenājanitastaṃ te sa kathaṃ janayiṣyati // Mś_7.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:178: sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:185: kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ // Mś_7.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:187: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā // Mś_7.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:188: aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:189: ihasthaḥ sarvalokasthaṃ sa tamo nihaniṣyati // Mś_7.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:193: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ // Mś_7.13 //
SA10bsa027_u:201: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati // Mś_7.17 //
SA10bsa027_u:211: na tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhamānaḥ ko 'nutpannaśca tiṣṭhati // Mś_7.22 //
SA10bsa027_u:215: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // Mś_7.24 //
SA10bsa027_u:216: sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:217: utpādasya yathotpādo nātmanā na parātmanā // Mś_7.25 //
SA10bsa027_u:227: ekatve na hi bhāvaśca nābhāvaścopapadyate // Mś_7.30 //
SA10bsa027_u:229: na dvitīyasya śirasacchedanaṃ vidyate yathā // Mś_7.31 //
SA10bsa027_u:230: na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
SA10bsa027_u:231: utpādasya yathotpādo nātmanā na parātmanā // Mś_7.32 //
SA10bsa027_u:234: yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
SA10bsa027_u:235: tathotpādastathā sthānaṃ tathā bhaṅga udāhṛtam // Mś_7.34 //
SA10bsa027_u:238: sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
SA10bsa027_u:240: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
SA10bsa027_u:241: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ // Mś_8.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:243: ahetukaṃ bhavetkarma kartā cāhetuko bhavet // Mś_8.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:244: hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:245: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate // Mś_8.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:247: dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate // Mś_8.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:249: mārgaḥ sarvakriyāṇāṃ ca nairarthakyaṃ prasajyate // Mś_8.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:252: satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat /
SA10bsa027_u:253: kartrā sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi // Mś_8.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:255: karoti kārakaḥ karma pūrvoktaireva hetubhiḥ // Mś_8.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:257: karoti kārakaḥ karma purvoktaireva hetubhiḥ // Mś_8.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:260: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10bsa027_u:264: kartuśca karmakartṛbhyāṃ śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayet // Mś_8.13 //
SA10bsa027_u:268: bhavanti yasya prāgebhyaḥ so 'stītyeke vadantyuta // Mś_9.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:270: bhāvasya tasmātprāgebhyaḥ so 'sti bhāvo vyavasthitaḥ // Mś_9.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:272: yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ // Mś_9.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:274: amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ // Mś_9.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:276: kutaḥ kiṃcidvinā kaścit kiṃcitkaṃcidvinā kutaḥ // Mś_9.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:279: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:280: ekaikasmātkathaṃ pūrvo darśanādeḥ sa vidyate // Mś_9.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:281: draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:284: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet // Mś_9.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:286: bhavanti yebhyasteṣveṣa bhūteṣvapi na vidyate // Mś_9.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:288: na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi // Mś_9.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:289: prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:290: na vidyate 'sti nāstīti nivṛttāstatra kalpanāḥ // Mś_9.12 //
SA10bsa027_u:301: anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:302: na nirvāsyatyanirvāṇaḥ sthāsyate vā svaliṅgavān // Mś_10.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:304: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā // Mś_10.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:310: evaṃ satīndhanaṃ cāpi bhaviṣyati niragnikam // Mś_10.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:312: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ // Mś_10.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:323: ātmanaśca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
SA10bsa027_u:329: naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:338: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim // Mś_11.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:339: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:340: vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana // Mś_11.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:341: pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
SA10bsa027_u:342: sarveṣāmapi bhāvānāṃ pūrvā koṭirna vidyate // Mś_11.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:346: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate // Mś_12.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:347: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:348: skandhānimānamī skandhāḥ saṃbhavanti pratītya hi // Mś_12.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:349: yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:352: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // Mś_12.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:354: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ // Mś_12.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:356: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat // Mś_12.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:358: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam // Mś_12.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:359: na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam /
SA10bsa027_u:363: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:364: bāhyānāmapi bhāvānāṃ cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate // Mś_12.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:368: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā // Mś_13.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:369: tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
SA10bsa027_u:372: asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ // Mś_13.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:374: kasya syādanyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yadi vidyate // Mś_13.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:376: yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate // Mś_13.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:380: na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati // Mś_13.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:382: yeṣāṃ tu śūnyatā dṛṣṭistānasādhyān babhāṣire // Mś_13.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:385: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:387: evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
SA10bsa027_u:388: traidhena śeṣāḥ kleśāśca śeṣāṇyāyatanāni ca // Mś_14.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:398: avidyamāne cānyatve nāstyanyadvā tadeva vā // Mś_14.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:399: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:400: saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca na vidyate // Mś_14.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:405: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10bsa027_u:406: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca // Mś_15.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:408: svabhāvaḥ parabhāvasya parabhāvo hi kathyate // Mś_15.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:410: svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati // Mś_15.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:413: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:414: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane // Mś_15.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:420: prakṛtau kasya ca satyāmanyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati // Mś_15.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:423: asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:427: saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
SA10bsa027_u:428: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ // Mś_16.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:430: pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo 'sau nāsti kaḥ saṃsariṣyati // Mś_16.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:432: vibhavaścānupādānaḥ kaḥ sa kiṃ saṃsariṣyati // Mś_16.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:436: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate // Mś_16.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:440: na cāsti tat śeṣamuktaṃ gamyamānagatāgataiḥ // Mś_16.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:441: baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate /
SA10bsa027_u:446: yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate // Mś_16.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:450: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca // Mś_17.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:454: cetayitvā ca yattūktaṃ tattu kāyikavācikam // Mś_17.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:458: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ // Mś_17.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:460: niruddhaṃ cennirūddhaṃ satkiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati // Mś_17.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:462: tataḥ phalamṛte bījātsa ca nābhipravartate // Mś_17.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:464: bījapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam // Mś_17.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:466: tataḥ phalamṛte cittātsa ca nābhipravartate // Mś_17.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:468: karmapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam // Mś_17.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:470: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca // Mś_17.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:473: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
SA10bsa027_u:476: caturvidho dhātutaḥ sa prakṛtyāvyākṛtaśca saḥ // Mś_17.14 //
SA10bsa027_u:477: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
SA10bsa027_u:482: pratisaṃdhau sadhātūnāmeka utpadyate tu saḥ // Mś_17.17 //
SA10bsa027_u:483: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:484: dviprakārasya sarvasya vipakke 'pi ca tiṣṭhati // Mś_17.18 //
SA10bsa027_u:486: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet // Mś_17.19 //
SA10bsa027_u:487: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:492: akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam // Mś_17.22 //
SA10bsa027_u:495: vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:499: karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:500: na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham // Mś_17.26 //
SA10bsa027_u:502: karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā // Mś_17.27 //
SA10bsa027_u:504: sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ // Mś_17.28 //
SA10bsa027_u:506: asti yasmādidaṃ karma tasmātkartāpi nāstyataḥ // Mś_17.29 //
SA10bsa027_u:507: karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:508: asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati // Mś_17.30 //
SA10bsa027_u:510: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ // Mś_17.31 //
SA10bsa027_u:511: tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam /
SA10bsa027_u:513: kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca /
SA10bsa027_u:521: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:522: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati // Mś_18.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:528: buddhairnātmā na cānātmā kaścidityapi deśitam // Mś_18.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:531: sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:535: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10bsa027_u:536: na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam // Mś_18.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:551: nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:552: yo gṛhyetāgṛhītaśca kālaḥ prajñapyate katham // Mś_19.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:554: na ca kaścana bhāvo 'sti kutaḥ kālo bhaviṣyati // Mś_19.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:557: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:558: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // Mś_20.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:559: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:560: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham // Mś_20.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:562: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate // Mś_20.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:563: hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam /
SA10bsa027_u:566: yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca hetorātmadvayaṃ bhavet // Mś_20.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:568: hetau niruddhe jātaṃ tatphalamāhetukaṃ bhavet // Mś_20.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:570: ekakālau prasajyete janako yaśca janyate // Mś_20.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:573: niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:576: tiṣṭhannapi kathaṃ hetuḥ phalena janayedvṛtaḥ // Mś_20.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:578: na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam // Mś_20.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:580: nājātena na jātena saṃgatirjātu vidyate // Mś_20.12 //
SA10bsa027_u:581: na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10bsa027_u:582: nātītena na jātena saṃgatirjātu vidyate // Mś_20.13 //
SA10bsa027_u:583: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10bsa027_u:584: nājātena na naṣṭena saṃgatirjātu vidyate // Mś_20.14 //
SA10bsa027_u:585: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:586: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam // Mś_20.15 //
SA10bsa027_u:593: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
SA10bsa027_u:594: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate // Mś_20.19 //
SA10bsa027_u:600: hetutvānupapattau ca phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // Mś_20.22 //
SA10bsa027_u:602: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam // Mś_20.23 //
SA10bsa027_u:604: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā // Mś_20.24 //
SA10bsa027_u:607: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
SA10bsa027_u:608: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai // Mś_21.1 //
SA10bsa027_u:609: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
SA10bsa027_u:610: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā // Mś_21.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:612: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // Mś_21.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:613: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā /
SA10bsa027_u:614: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate // Mś_21.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:616: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // Mś_21.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:618: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // Mś_21.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:620: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca // Mś_21.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:621: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:622: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate // Mś_21.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:628: dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva mohādvibhava eva ca // Mś_21.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:631: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10bsa027_u:635: prasajyate sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet // Mś_21.14 //
SA10bsa027_u:642: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:643: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ // Mś_21.18 //
SA10bsa027_u:647: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate // Mś_21.20 //
SA10bsa027_u:648: evaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu na yuktā bhavasaṃtatiḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:649: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ // Mś_21.21 //
SA10bsa027_u:652: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:655: svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ // Mś_22.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:657: yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ // Mś_22.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:658: yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:663: yaśca nāstyanupādāya sa upādāsyate katham // Mś_22.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:665: na cāsti nirupādānaḥ kathaṃcana tathāgataḥ // Mś_22.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:667: upādānena sa kathaṃ prajñapyeta tathāgataḥ // Mś_22.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:671: prajñapyate ca śūnyena kathaṃ śūnyastathāgataḥ // Mś_22.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:673: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate // Mś_22.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:675: antānantādi cāpyatra kuntaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam // Mś_22.12 //
SA10bsa027_u:679: paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā // Mś_22.14 //
SA10bsa027_u:681: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam // Mś_22.15 //
SA10bsa027_u:689: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ // Mś_23.2 //
SA10bsa027_u:691: taṃ vināstitvanāstitve kleśānāṃ sidhyataḥ katham // Mś_23.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:692: kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati /
SA10bsa027_u:693: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit // Mś_23.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:694: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā /
SA10bsa027_u:695: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi na pañcadhā // Mś_23.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:699: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate // Mś_23.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:702: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:708: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:709: aśubhe 'vidyamāne ca kuto dveṣo bhaviṣyati // Mś_23.12 //
SA10bsa027_u:711: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ // Mś_23.13 //
SA10bsa027_u:713: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ // Mś_23.14 //
SA10bsa027_u:714: yena gṛṇhāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
SA10bsa027_u:715: upaśāntāni sarvāṇi tasmādgrāho na vidyate // Mś_23.15 //
SA10bsa027_u:716: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā /
SA10bsa027_u:721: vimṛśasva svayaṃ kasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ // Mś_23.18 //
SA10bsa027_u:724: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10bsa027_u:725: na svataḥ parataśceti viparyayagataḥ kutaḥ // Mś_23.20 //
SA10bsa027_u:726: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:727: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ // Mś_23.21 //
SA10bsa027_u:728: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:729: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate // Mś_23.22 //
SA10bsa027_u:732: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit /
SA10bsa027_u:733: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati // Mś_23.24 //
SA10bsa027_u:735: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran ko 'sadbhāvaṃ prahāsyati // Mś_23.25 //
SA10bsa027_u:738: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:740: parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca /
SA10bsa027_u:743: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ // Mś_24.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:744: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:746: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:747: evaṃ trīṇyapi ratnāni brūvāṇaḥ pratibādhase // Mś_24.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:750: atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam /
SA10bsa027_u:751: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase // Mś_24.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:753: lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca satyaṃ ca paramārthataḥ // Mś_24.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:755: te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane // Mś_24.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:759: sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā // Mś_24.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:763: doṣaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ sa śūnye nopapadyate // Mś_24.13 //
SA10bsa027_u:764: sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:765: sarvaṃ na yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate // Mś_24.14 //
SA10bsa027_u:770: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām /
SA10bsa027_u:771: utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase // Mś_24.17 //
SA10bsa027_u:775: yasmāttasmādaśūnyo hi dharmaḥ kaścinna vidyate // Mś_24.19 //
SA10bsa027_u:779: anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate // Mś_24.21 //
SA10bsa027_u:782: na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:785: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate // Mś_24.24 //
SA10bsa027_u:786: yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:789: parijñānaṃ nanu kila svabhāvaḥ samavasthitaḥ // Mś_24.26 //
SA10bsa027_u:791: parijñāvanna yujyante catvāryapi phalāni ca // Mś_24.27 //
SA10bsa027_u:794: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:795: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ // Mś_24.29 //
SA10bsa027_u:797: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati // Mś_24.30 //
SA10bsa027_u:798: apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate /
SA10bsa027_u:799: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate // Mś_24.31 //
SA10bsa027_u:802: na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:803: kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi // Mś_24.33 //
SA10bsa027_u:804: vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:805: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate // Mś_24.34 //
SA10bsa027_u:806: dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:815: sarvakleśaprahāṇaṃ ca yadyaśūnyaṃ na vidyate // Mś_24.39 //
SA10bsa027_u:817: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca // Mś_24.40 //
SA10bsa027_u:820: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:827: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // Mś_25.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:828: bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:829: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana // Mś_25.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:831: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate // Mś_25.6 //
SA10bsa027_u:832: yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:833: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate // Mś_25.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:835: nirvāṇaṃ na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate // Mś_25.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:839: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate // Mś_25.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:841: bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca mokṣastacca na yujyate // Mś_25.11 //
SA10bsa027_u:845: asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau // Mś_25.13 //
SA10bsa027_u:849: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati // Mś_25.15 //
SA10bsa027_u:850: naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:851: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate // Mś_25.16 //
SA10bsa027_u:853: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate // Mś_25.17 //
SA10bsa027_u:855: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate // Mś_25.18 //
SA10bsa027_u:858: nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
SA10bsa027_u:861: nirvāṇamaparāntaṃ ca pūrvāntaṃ ca samāśritāḥ // Mś_25.21 //
SA10bsa027_u:865: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ // Mś_25.23 //
SA10bsa027_u:876: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:879: sparśaḥ saḥ tasmātsparśācca vedanā saṃpravartate // Mś_26.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:883: syāddhi yadyanupādāno mucyeta na bhavedbhavaḥ // Mś_26.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:884: pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ bhavājjātiḥ pravartate /
SA10bsa027_u:901: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam // Mś_27.3 //
SA10bsa027_u:903: upādānavinirmukta ātmā te katamaḥ punaḥ // Mś_27.4 //
SA10bsa027_u:905: syādupādānamevātmā nāsti cātmeti vaḥ punaḥ // Mś_27.5 //
SA10bsa027_u:909: gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate // Mś_27.7 //
SA10bsa027_u:911: ātmā nāstyanupādānaḥ nāpi nāstyeṣa niścayaḥ // Mś_27.8 //
SA10bsa027_u:913: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam // Mś_27.9 //
SA10bsa027_u:914: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:915: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ // Mś_27.10 //
SA10bsa027_u:919: kṛtako vā bhavedātmā saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ // Mś_27.12 //
SA10bsa027_u:921: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti naiṣā samupapadyate // Mś_27.13 //
SA10bsa027_u:924: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:925: anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam // Mś_27.15 //
SA10bsa027_u:929: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavetacca na yujyate // Mś_27.17 //
SA10bsa027_u:931: siddhe na śāśvataṃ kāmaṃ naivāśāśvatamityapi // Mś_27.18 //
SA10bsa027_u:933: yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ // Mś_27.19 //
SA10bsa027_u:936: antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:941: skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemānatha loko 'ntavān bhavet // Mś_27.23 //
SA10bsa027_u:947: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate // Mś_27.26 //
SA10bsa027_u:953: kva kasya katamāḥ kasmātsaṃbhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭayaḥ // Mś_27.29 //
